data.title: About Hebei
data.text:
Xiongan New Area

Xiongan New Area sits at the center of a triangular area with Beijing, Tianjin, and Hebei's capital Shijiazhuang at the apexes. It spans the counties of Xiongxian, Rongcheng and Anxin in Hebei, and is home to Baiyangdian, a major wetland in northern China.

Jun 23,2022

Xingtai

Seated in the southern part of Hebei Province, Xingtai borders Shandong Province to the east, Shanxi Province to the west, Handan to the south, Shijiazhuang and Hengshui to the north and northeast. Xingtai has a 3,500-year-old history. It has been widely known because "it was an ancient capital being fertile and close to rivers and mountains."In ancient times, it was the origin place of the Sh...

Jun 22,2022

Hengshui

Located in the southeast of Hebei Province, Hengshui City neighbors Xingtai, Handan, Cangzhou and Baoding within the province and is close to Dezhou in Shandong Province. It is about 119 kilometers away Shijiazhuang and 250 kilometers from Beijing. Hengshui is rich in history and local cultures. In the Three Kingdoms period, Hengshui's Jizhou was the very place where Yuan Shao had stationed hi...

Jun 22,2022

Cangzhou

Cangzhou, located in the southeast part of Hebei Province, is 240 kilometers south of Beijing and 120 kilometers south of Tianjin. Cangzhou gained its name from its close proximity to the Bohai Sea. It was said to be one of main sources of the ancient legend that Pangu separated the sky from earth. Historically, successive dynasties had set up counties in this area. The famous Grand Canal zigz...

Jun 22,2022

Shijiazhuang

Shijiazhuang City is situated in the south central Hebei Province, adjacent to Hengshui in the east, Xingtai in the south, Yangquan (Shanxi Province) in the west and Baoding in the north. With complete industrial departments, Shijiazhuang City has formed a comprehensive industrial structure with a reasonable layout based on textile, medicine, electronics, machinery, chemicals, building materia...

Jun 22,2022

Zhangjiakou

The city of Zhangjiakou is situated in northwestern Hebei Province. As the Co-host City of the 2022 Winter Olympic Games, Zhangjiakou has a somewhat rugged topography characterized by high mountains, deep valleys, and rocky pathways, as a result it is an ideal place for holidays, and it can provide tourists with a variety of experiences. In the area, there are significant differences in differ...

Jun 22,2022

Qinhuangdao

Qinhuangdao is situated in the northeastern part of Hebei Province. It borders the Yanshan Mountains in the north and Bohai Bay in the south. As one of north China's ice-free natural harbors, it abounds in fish, prawns, and other aquatic products. The famous health resort, Beidaihe Beach, lies southwest of the city. Qinhuangdao has a long history. The first emperor of Qin Dynasty once statione...

Jun 22,2022

Tangshan

Tangshan city is located in the east of Hebei Province, bordering the Bohai Sea to the south, Yanshan Mountain to the north, Beijing and Tianjin to the west. It is about 154 kilometers from Beijing. Tangshan has a long history, with ancient humans living in the area as early as 4,000 years ago. Tangshan is an important heavy industrial city in North China. Its output include machinery, motor ...

Jun 22,2022

Langfang

Situated in the eastern-central part of Hebei Province, Langfang borders Beijing to the north, Tianjin to the east, Cangzhou to the south, and Baoding to the west. Langfang has a long history. Today visitors can see the ancient Song-Liao Battle Road in Yongqing, mosques, and other sights. Besides, Langfang is a city of intangible cultural heritage.There are world cultural heritages such as Be...

Jun 22,2022

Baoding

Baoding, situated in central Hebei province, is approximately 150 kilometers southwest of Beijing. As a historical city with thousands of years of accumulation and rich deposits, it has a number of notable historic sites and national-level cultural relics. As for travel, Baoding is a famous tourist city with beautiful scenery and enjoyable leisure, and the ecological environment there is primi...

Jun 22,2022

Dingzhou

Dingzhou is a county-level city in the prefecture-level city of Baoding, Hebei Province. Dingzhou is about halfway between Baoding and Shijiazhuang, 196 kilometers southwest of Beijing, and 68 kilometers northeast of Shijiazhuang, marking it a treasured place of business investment. Relying on its historical and cultural resources including Ding pottery and the Dingzhou silk tapestry, Dingzho...

Jun 22,2022

Xinji

Xinji, as a county-level city of Hebei Province, is under the administration of the city of Shijiazhuang. It is the easternmost county-level division of Shijiangzhuang. Xinji was formerly named Shulu County, and became a county-level city in 1986. The leather industry has contributed significantly to economic development of Xinji. Xinji international leather city is the best place for busin...

Jun 22,2022

Handan

Handan is a located in southwest of Hebei province. It borders Xingtai on the north, and the provinces of Shanxi on the west, Henan on the south and Shandong on the east. As a famous historical and cultural city, Handan enjoys both ancient civilization and modern character. Throughout the city's long history, it contributed significantly to Chinese culture, serving as the capital of State of Z...

Jun 22,2022
